1370: Rampe moved to Kerckstraet.C.1 after marriage.
Got married to Wendelmodis at age 25 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Wendelmodis, Walwin, at age 27.
1373: Had a daughter with Wendelmodis, Meynseth, at age 28.
1374: Had a daughter with Wendelmodis, Breghlent, at age 29.
1375: Lost his wife Wendelmodis while she was giving birth to Deghen in 1375.
Lost daughter Breghlent when Breghlent was 2 years old.
Became caretaker of Walwin, Meynseth, Deghen at age 31.
1386: Lost son Deghen when Deghen was 12 years old.
